artview.core.core.Component¶

class artview.core.core.Component(name='Component', parent=None, flags=0)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QMainWindow

Abstract class for a ART-view component

__init__(name='Component', parent=None, flags=0)[source]¶

Initialize the class

Parameters :

[Optional] :

name : string

Display window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to Component. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Methods

Component.closeEvent(QCloseEvent) Reimplementation to remove from components list

Component.disconnectAllVariables() Call connectSharedVariable for all keys in sharedVariables
Component.disconnectSharedVariable(var) Connect variable ‘var’ to its slot as defined in
